column4: how can I create a launcher that will run a command in terminal?
create a bash script, it is easy, just a line that is called the shabang, and your command in the second line
and then give execute permissions to the file
can you walk me through on how to create that file
Stormx2 already told you whats the first line, 1.-open gedit or another text editor, 2.- put "#!/bin/bash" in the first line (without the quotes), 3.-put your command in the second line
save the file, if you are comfortable with terminal, run chmod +x name_of_file
otherwise, right click the file, and look for permissions, and click on execute permissions

don't use sudo then, use gksudo instead, sudo works only if you are in a terminal, gksudo launches a dialog that asks you for the password
gksudo is the same as gksu
